name: Shake Kids
description: The player chooses the main character as one of Shake Kids, either the boy Randy or the girl Nihni. The player navigates the Shake Kid around a strange world from a tilted 3D view. The main attack is throwing a boomerang jug at weird enemies. The player's vitality is measured in hearts, which extends when an incrementing number of hearts are collected. Throughout the game, the player will need to interact with characters and solve puzzles.
